notes: Does not work against wards ( Plague Ward, Mass Serpent Ward, Death Ward).
Does not reduce physical damage from spells, except from Moon Glaives and The Swarm.
For more details, see Damage Block.
abilities.name: Damage Block
abilities.description: Grants a 50% chance to block 20 damage from incoming attacks on melee heroes, and 9 damage on ranged.

description: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.
trivia: In The Lab, a VR game by Valve, there are some Bendie soldiers who wield Stout Shields in the minigame Longshot, along with other Dota 2 weapons like Axe's war axe, Huskar's spear and Legion Commander's sword.
tips: Useful for tanking creep attacks as a melee hero, and more effective than a Ring of Protection against enemy physical attacks in the early game.
